oss_project documentation¶

Overview¶

oss_project is a python project. This is the pymood package available in pyhon. The pymood package analyzes emotions based on text input. And you can also talk to chatbots.

Usage¶

Installation¶

blah blah

Creating recipes¶

To analyze the emotion contained in a sentence in English, you can use pymood.anlaysis_emotion() function:

pymood.anlaysis_emotion(kind=String)¶

Return a emoji.

Parameters:

kind – Component of type string

Returns:

The ingredients string

Return type:

str
